scripts.test: browserify index.js -s objectify -o test/objectified.js && casperjs test test/objectified-tests.js
scripts.browser: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s objectify -o dist/objectified.js && uglifyjs dist/objectified.js -m -c sequences,dead_code,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars,drop_console -o dist/objectified.min.js
